Participation
Class Discount_1000

java.lang.Object
  Participation.Discount
      Participation.Discount_1000
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class Discount_1000
extends Discount
implements java.io.Serializable

This discount token gives 50 euro discount to every 1000 euro participations.

See also Discount.

description in class Discount

applicable

public boolean applicable(Customer c)
Return true if this discount token is applicable on the given customer. This discount token in only applicable when the customer has at least 1000 euro participation value.

Specified by:
applicable in class Discount

calcDiscount

public int calcDiscount(Customer c)
This methods returns the discount value, expressed in euro-cent. This token gives 50 euro discount to every 1000 euro participations.

Specified by:
calcDiscount in class Discount
